about_the_game:
Glory Wall - The Ultimate Fantasy Clicker Game

Glory Wall is a unique animated clicker that invites you into a world of shy girls and their secret fantasies. Help these modest ladies break out of their shells and explore their deepest desires. With a wide variety of sensual toys, you're the guide to unlocking their ultimate pleasure.

Discover the Secret Lives of Shy Girls

Behind their quiet and reserved demeanor, these girls dream of experiencing something extraordinary. In real life, they’re the introverts you’d never suspect, but here they feel safe to unleash their fantasies. With your help and an arsenal of playful toys, they can explore their desires and let go of their inhibitions. Take them on a journey of discovery, passion, and pure satisfaction.

Game Features:

  • Animated Girls: Each girl is beautifully animated, bringing their expressions and fantasies to life.

  • Wide Variety of Toys: From playful to daring, enjoy an extensive collection of toys to keep every experience unique.

  • Relaxing Music: Immerse yourself in a soothing soundtrack that enhances the atmosphere of the game.

  • Engaging Gameplay: A simple yet addictive clicker format that keeps you coming back for more.

  • Unique Personalities: Every girl has her own style, preferences, and fantasies for you to discover.

  • Unlockable Content: Progress through the game to reveal new toys, scenes, and surprises.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

name: Glory Wall!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4330 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final

short_description: Glory Wall - the ultimate animated clicker game with shy girls and their hidden fantasies. A wide variety of sex toys will help satisfy every girl! Help them fulfill their deepest desires!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Finnish, Czech, Swedish
